definition: a saw/to cut with a saw
tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man

sentences.english: They had been sawing; that was why they were covered in the sawdust.
sentences.chinese: 他們一直在鋸木頭，因此弄得滿身都是鋸末。

sentences.english: Frost collected in the window corners like sawdust.
sentences.chinese: 窗角邊結了一層鋸末般的白霜。

sentences.english: Wood cuttings and sawdust can be compressed into boards.
sentences.chinese: 木頭的碎渣和鋸末可以壓成木板。

sentences.english: Use wood chips as mulch around trees.
sentences.chinese: 用鋸末作樹木的覆蓋料。

sentences.english: and sawdust and filbert husks to make red wine more astringent.
sentences.chinese: 鋸末和榛子殼使紅酒口感更加澀。

sentences.english: The teeth of the saw were clogged with sawdust.
Wood cuttings and sawdust can be compressed into boards.
sentences.chinese: 木屑和鋸末可壓制成板。

sentences.english: Mable commenced sweeping up the sawdust while I packed up my tools.
sentences.chinese: 梅布爾開始打掃地上的鋸末，我則收起工具。
